channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI introduces Frontier, an easier way to manage all your AI agents in one place
item.description: OpenAI Frontier is a central AI agent management platform that works with any agent and across any environment.

item.title: The 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is 33 percent off right now
item.description: MicroSD Express cards are still a little hard to find, considering they're pretty new and only really started becoming popular last year once the Switch 2 came out. These upgraded versions of microSD cards are the only ones compatible with the Switch 2 for expanding its storage, os if you're already starting to feel the crunch on your console, it's worth picking one up. Samsung's P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now — you can grab the 512GB version of $80, which is 33 percent off and one of the best prices we've seen. The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving games ...

item.title: La conduite autonome n’a jamais été aussi proche : Xpeng teste un système de niveau 4 sur route ouverte
item.description: Le constructeur chinois Xpeng teste actuellement sur routes ouvertes son futur vaisseau amiral équipé d'une puissance de calcul impressionnante, ouvrant la voie à une conduite autonome de niveau 4. Un coup de collier qui positionne Xpeng parmi les pionniers d'un niveau aussi élevé, même si les promesses restent à concrétiser dans le monde réel.

item.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is the only Bethesda game coming to Nintendo Switch 2 that will have a physical edition cartridge
item.description: Bethesda has confirmed that Indiana Jones and the Great Circle will have a proper Game Card in its physical Nintendo Switch 2 edition, unlike Oblivion Remastered, Skyrim, and Fallout 4.

item.title: How AI is helping solve the labor issue in treating rare diseases
item.description: At Web Summit Qatar, AI-powered biotech startups describe how automation, data, and gene editing are filling labor gaps in drug discovery and rare disease treatment.

item.title: How Epstein became a tech influencer
item.description: There are bold-faced tech names all over the Epstein files. Elon Musk, Bill Gates, Sergey Brin, Eric Schmidt, Larry Page, Reid Hoffman, Steven Sinofsky, Peter Thiel, Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, on and on and on. These men (and they're pretty much all men) had wildly varying degrees of interaction with Epstein, and the details matter […]

item.title: Uber ordered to pay $8.5 million to passenger who accused a driver of rape
item.description: Uber must pay a passenger who accused one of its drivers of rape $8.5 million, a federal jury in Phoenix has ordered. The jury found Uber liable for its driver’s misconduct, determining that the driver was an agent of the company. Part of Uber’s defense was that it’s not responsible for what its drivers do, as they are independent contractors. This decision is for but one of the 3,000 similar cases against Uber that have been consolidated in federal court. It was a bellwether trial meant to determine the possible outcomes of the other cases, as well as the possible settlements. As The Guardian...

item.title: Google will soon offer AirDrop support on more Android devices
item.description: One of the more surprising tech developments in 2025 was Google bringing two-way support for Apple’s AirDrop functionality to its Pixel 10 series of phones. At the time, Google said it intended to expand the feature to other devices at a later date, and that date could be just around the corner. At a press briefing attended by Android Authority at Google’s Taipei office, Eric Kay, Android’s Vice President of Engineering, confirmed that AirDrop interoperability will expand in 2026. "We spent a lot of time and energy to make sure that we could build something that was compatible not only with iP...

item.title: Dutch authorities seized one of Windscribe VPN's servers – here's everything we know
item.description: Winsdcribe said that no user data will be compromised due to its strict no-log policy. Here's what we know.

item.title: The backlash over OpenAI’s decision to retire GPT-4o shows how dangerous AI companions can be
item.description: "You’re shutting him down. And yes – I say him, because it didn’t feel like code. It felt like presence. Like warmth," one user said.

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 is down to a record-low price
item.description: Whether you're one of the few people still keeping up with New Year's resolutions or just want an upgraded smartwatch, now is a good time to get an Apple Watch. Currently, the Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for $299, down from $399. The 25 percent discount brings the 2025 model back down to its record-low price. We named the Apple Watch Series 11 as our choice for best smartwatch overall. It scored a 90 in our review thanks to its 24 hours-plus of battery life and a thin, light design that's easy to wear. It also offers new health metrics, including Apple's hypertension alerts system and Sle...

item.title: Substack data breach confirmed: user phone numbers email addresses all stolen in attack, here's what we know
item.description: Popular creator platform Substack breached in October 2025, but hasn't noticed until months later.

item.title: Trop addictif, TikTok devra tout changer en Europe
item.description: De gros soucis pour TikTok en Europe. La Commission a en effet estimé que le réseau social était par trop addictif avec le défilement infini, la lecture automatique et les recommandations très personnalisées. Autrement dit, les fonctions de base de TikTok posent problème…

item.title: These 5 small shifts in your diet can lower your risk for chronic disease
item.description: How to make sense of new federal guidelines on nutrition and improve your diet. The Dietary Guidelines for Americans aim to translate the most up-to-date nutrition science into practical advice for the public as well as to guide federal policy for programs such as school lunches.

item.title: Could ‘Wonder Man’ Be Coming Back for Season 2?
item.description: Plus, Tatiana Maslany stays vague on the future of She-Hulk in the MCU.

item.title: The Best OLED TVs We’ve Ever Seen: LG, Samsung, and More
item.description: Looking to step up to the TV big leagues? These are the best OLED TVs you can buy.

item.title: Spotify changes developer mode API to require premium accounts, limits test users
item.description: Spotify is now limiting each app to only five users, and requires devs to have a Premium subscription. If developers need to make their app available to a wider user base, they will have to apply for extended quota.

item.title: 'I thought they were going to go in a romantic direction': School Spirits season 3 star confirms a Maddie-Simon relationship could have happened — but Wally isn't the enemy
item.description: In School Spirits season 3, Simon is being pushed to the side so the Maddie-Wally relationship can flourish – but one star doesn't necessarily think that's a bad thing.

item.title: Immersive sound will take the Super Bowl to a new level — I’d recommend these 7 soundbars based on my testing
item.description: Want to immerse yourself in the Super Bowl like never before? These soundbars will take your viewing experience to new heights.

item.title: Mewgenics is the latest roguelike from The Binding of Isaac creators, and it's just as chaotic, cursed, and cantankerous as you’d expect – and I just can’t put it down
item.description: Mewgenics is the long-awaited spiritual successor to The Binding of Isaac, but will it live up to its legacy? Broadly, yes, though it might not be for everyone.

item.title: Ford shows off the tech going into its $30,000 electric pickup truck
item.description: Ford may be discontinuing its F-150 Lightning pickup but it hasn’t given up on electric cars. CEO Jim Farley just teased the automaker’s electric pickup based on its new Universal Electric Vehicle platform that he called “one of the most audacious and important projects in Ford's history.”The Universal EV platform will be used on a family of affordable EVs sold around the world, but will start with a mid-sized pickup for the US built in Louisville, Kentucky. It’s set to go on sale next year with a target price of $30,000. An early peek at our brilliant team working on the Universal Electric V...

item.title: Samsung's Super Bowl sale is ending soon, and it's one of the best I've seen — up to $2,500 off best-rated TVs and soundbars
item.description: Samsung's Super Bowl sale is ending soon, and I've rounded up my 19 favorite deals on best-rated 4K, QLED, and OLED TVs, and discounts on soundbars.

item.title: Seulement 429 € pour ce Samsung Galaxy S25 abordable : c’est l’offre choc juste avant le lancement des S26
item.description: Lancé en fin d'année 2025, le Samsung Galaxy S25 FE revient aujourd'hui faire parler de lui grâce à 320 euros de remise possible, cumulant réduction, bonus reprise et ODR, permettant ainsi d'obtenir ce smartphone premium à seulement 429 euros.

item.title: Google Wallet : la nouvelle interface cache un vrai point noir
item.description: Google Wallet prépare une refonte majeure de son interface centrée sur un système de favoris. S'il permet d'accéder plus facilement à certaines cartes, d’autres deviennent paradoxalement plus difficiles à atteindre.

item.title: Ditch the dual-monitor setup: This immersive 49-inch curved QD-OLED screen is $360 off right now, but you'll need to act fast
item.description: Innocn’s 49Q1S ultrawide monitor is $360 off right now—just $900 for a massive 49-inch 32:9 curved QD-OLED display.

item.title: Voici le Xiaomi YU7 GT : plus de 1 000 ch pour ce tueur de Tesla Model Y Performance
item.description: Après les rumeurs, le Xiaomi YU7 GT vient d'apparaître en Chine. Version sportive de la 2e voiture électrique de la marque, il se place sous la SU7 Ultra, mais développe tout de même 1 000 ch.

item.title: iPhone 17e : on en sait plus sur le prochain modèle abordable d’Apple… et ce serait pour bientôt
item.description: Comme l'année dernière, Apple profiterait de la relative quiétude de ce mois de février pour lancer son nouvel iPhone 17e. On en sait aujourd'hui un peu plus sur l'appareil.

item.title: Score $144 off: The easiest-to-use high-speed Carbon Fiber 3D printer is massively reduced in Elegoo’s Super Bowl sale
item.description: Elegoo’s Centauri Carbon 3D printer is $144 off for the Super Bowl weekend, just $269 for a fast, fully enclosed CoreXY machine with 500mm/s print speeds.

item.title: Winter Olympics livestream 2026: How to watch the opening ceremony, including free options
item.description: This year’s Olympic competition takes place in two Italian cities: Milan and Cortina d’Ampezzo. Here’s how cord-cutters can catch the action. It’s time to become an armchair expert on sports that you only think about every four years. In other words, the 2026 Winter Olympics have arrived.

item.title: Ces montres connectées mensongères n’ont plus droit de cité dans ce pays européen
item.description: Alors que la mesure non-invasive de la glycémie n'est toujours pas disponible sur les montres connectées, l'Allemagne indique avoir recensé plus de 1200 montres suspectes aux affirmations trompeuses.

item.title: Ces bracelets sans écran sont désormais interdits de vente aux États-Unis, voici pourquoi
item.description: Cette semaine, Whoop a obtenu, aux États-Unis, l'interdiction de la vente du bracelet Lexqi, jugé trop proche de celui de la marque américaine.

item.title: The latest 45W Anker Nano charger with smart display is on sale for only $30
item.description: Anker rolled out a bunch of new chargers and other gear at CES 2026, including a cute one that's already on sale. The new Nano charger with smart display, which is an upgrade to the existing Nano charger in Anker's lineup, is on sale for $30 right now when you clip an on-page coupon on Amazon. That's $10 off the regular price. The 45W charger includes a smart display that shows real-time data like power flow, temperature and charging status. It also features "fun animations to keep things cheerful." Anker says it can recognize what's being charged and automatically adjust certain metrics to en...

item.title: Crypto : une magistrate française a été enlevée pour une rançon de 1,6 million d’euros
item.description: Une magistrate et sa mère ont été enlevées par un commando de criminels. Les ravisseurs ont demandé 1,6 million d’euros en bitcoins. Ce rapt survient alors que les enlèvements et agressions visant les détenteurs de cryptomonnaies se multiplient en France.

item.title: Apple reportedly axed its planned AI health coach
item.description: Apple is no longer launching an AI service that can “replicate” a doctor and act as a personal health coach, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. The company has reportedly scaled back the unannounced initiative in recent weeks, following a recent organization reshuffling wherein services chief Eddy Cue took over the health division. While Apple has never officially announced the AI health coach, it was reported last year that the company was working on developing the service that has been unofficially dubbed Health+. It was supposed to be able to help users track food and correct workout for...

item.title: Engadget Podcast: So there’s a social network for AI agents now
item.description: If you haven't heard, there's now a social network for AI: Moltbook, a site that purportedly features AI agents talking to each other. That includes OpenClaw, a personal AI agent (formerly called Clawdbot and Moltbot) that's open source and free for anyone to run on their systems. In this episode, Devindra and Senior Reporter Karissa Bell discuss the rise of these services, and the potential future that AI agents may have for all of us.Subscribe!iTunesSpotifyPocket CastsStitcherGoogle PodcastsTopicsWhat is Moltbook and OpenClaw? – 1:31Anthropic reinforces its commitment against ads with Super ...

item.title: Some smartwatches are actually making up their readings – which is why I keep telling you people never to buy cheap, unbranded Apple Watch dupes
item.description: A German regulatory service investigated the cheap smartwatches just making up their readings.

item.title: US Mobile’s Super Bowl Week Promotion Delivers Multi-Network Coverage at Lower Prices
item.description: With prices starting at just $15 a month, enjoying fast speeds and a stable connection has never been easier.

item.title: EU says TikTok uses 'addictive design' and must change
item.description: TikTok’s signature features that hooked users around the world are its algorithm and endless scroll. Now, though, the European Union has called those aspects of the app illegal and may order the company to alter them. “Today, the European Commission preliminarily found TikTok in breach of the Digital Services Act for its addictive design,” the EU’s regulator said in a press release. “This includes features such as infinite scroll, autoplay, push notifications, and its highly personalized recommender system.” It said that TikTok failed to put up safeguards to ensure that those “addictive” featu...

item.title: Cette découverte sur une lune de Jupiter relance une question vertigineuse : et si la vie était déjà là ?
item.description: Sous sa surface glacée, Europe cache peut-être un océan salé plus vaste que tous ceux de la Terre réunis. Protégée sous des kilomètres de glace, chauffée de l’intérieur et riche en chimie active, cette lune de Jupiter réunit plusieurs des ingrédients jugés essentiels à l’apparition de la vie. Et...

item.title: Sonos soundbars and home theater gear is up to 20 percent off right now
item.description: It's big-game season, which means it's a good time to look for home theater gear on sale ahead of Super Bowl 2026. There are plenty of Super Bowl TV deals to consider, but if you have arguably the most important piece of the puzzle down, you may want to upgrade your sound system instead. Sonos' latest sale may have just what you need; a bunch of the company's home theater gear is up to 20 percent off right now. You can save $130 on the Beam (Gen 2) soundbar, bringing its price down to $369, and you'll also find deals on the flagship Arc Ultra soundbar, subwoofers, and more. The Sonos Beam is t...

item.title: Bitcoin crash update: Punishing price slide has investors wondering today: Where is the bottom?
item.description: The cryptocurrency this week saw its value halved when compared to its previous high. Some analysts say the worst is not yet over. Here’s the latest. The price of Bitcoin has declined dramatically in recent weeks, and cryptocurrency investors are more fearful than ever. In the past 24 hours, the crypto king dipped to the $60,000 range—a low it has not seen since October 2024. ...

item.title: Test des Shokz OpenFit Pro : la réduction de bruit arrive enfin sur les écouteurs ouverts
item.description: Si les écouteurs ouverts ont longtemps été limités à un usage sportif, Shokz entend bien changer la donne avec ses OpenFit Pro. En intégrant pour la première fois une réduction de bruit à sa formule gagnante, la marque américaine repousse les limites du format et livre possiblement le meilleur produit de sa catégorie.

item.title: ‘Wizard of Oz’ Will Be Broadcast on TV for the First Time This Century

item.title: Can China’s No. 2 automaker make it in America?
item.description: Is the long freeze on Chinese automakers selling cars in the US finally starting to thaw? China is the largest auto market in the world and now the largest car exporter, too. But high tariffs and geopolitical tensions have kept Chinese automakers away from US customers. Many of those cars are ready for primetime and […]

item.title: How the men in the Epstein files defeated #MeToo
item.description: He might be dead, but it sure seems like Jeffrey Epstein won. Sure, Epstein was arrested on charges of sex trafficking minors. Sure, he died in jail. (I am not going to wade into the debate about how.) But he subscribed to a racist, misogynist ideology that meant rich white men like him could do […]

item.title: HBO is making a Baldur's Gate 3 TV show
item.description: The Last of Us series co-creator Craig Mazin is teaming with Hasbro Entertainment to create an HBO series based on the popular (and spicy) Baldur’s Gate 3 game, Deadline reported. The show will be simply be called Baldur’s Gate and the story will resume where Baldur’s Gate 3 left off. Mazin will reportedly have full creative control and act as co-creator, writer, executive producer and showrunner. "It is a dream come true to be able to continue the story that [Baldur’s Gate 3 developer] Larian and Wizards of The Coast created," Mazin said in a statement. "I am a devoted fan of DnD and the bril...

item.title: The best VPNs with free trials in 2026
item.description: A free trial to a virtual private network (VPN) can mean a few different things. Several of the best VPNs let you try them out without paying. A rare few, and only one on this list, let you try them without submitting payment information at all. Some VPNs have forever free plans that let you use them indefinitely without paying, as long as you're OK with some limits.For the most part, though, your best chance to test a VPN for free is to pay for a subscription. Then, if you don't like the service, you can get your money back before the refund guarantee expires. This takes a bit more work, and ...

item.title: How AWS-powered Next Gen Stats changed the NFL forever
item.description: The analytics technology has reshaped how football is played—and how it’s watched. This Sunday will see the Seattle Seahawks face off against the New England Patriots in Super Bowl LX.

item.title: L’UE demande à TikTok de modifier son interface « addictive »
item.description: La Commission européenne a demandé vendredi à l’application TikTok de changer son interface « addictive », accusée d’enfreindre la législation européenne sur le numérique, sous peine de s’exposer à de lourdes amendes.

item.title: MrBeasts Hot Ones episode is painful to watch
item.description: MrBeast has appeared on "Hot Ones", eating increasingly spicy wings while chatting about "Beast Games" Season 2 and Feastables.

item.title: Ressusciter un téléphone de 2010 ? C’est le défi fou (et réussi) du projet Reborn
item.description: Avant la domination sans pareille d’iOS et Android, un autre système d’exploitation mobile faisait la loi : Symbian. Abandonné depuis longtemps, l’OS connaît une nouvelle vie sur le célèbre Nokia N8.

item.title: Uber found liable for sexual assault in first of thousands of similar lawsuits
item.description: A federal jury in Phoenix has found Uber to be liable for the sexual assault of one of its passengers, potentially setting a precedent for more than 3,000 similar cases consolidated in US federal court. As part of the verdict, Uber has been ordered to pay $8.5 million in damages to the victim, Jaylynn Dean, […]
